column4: im on a live cd right now,  7.10 and im trying to get this installed on my fakeraid. problem i'm having is that dmraid does not recognize my drives as a raid. i want to retrieve the raid meta info manually but fdisk (-u -l /dev/sda) says it can't open the device. the partition manage reads it fine though. what could be wrong?
great to hear you got some sleep, but why wont fdisk read my drive?
make sure you are root (su root)
